Posts.Content: May 6, 2017 06:18AM LittleMissVic wrote: I just wanted to thank you for starting his thread!!  I'm new to being cancer free so am miles off being able to add to this group but have been so frightened after my path results and needed to see some positivity! Thank you so much X  (I was dx at 33 in Aug 2016 with G3 S2 IDC ER+ 8/8 21mm tumour and positive node. Completed six rounds of neo-adjuvant FEC-T and had surgery (therapeutic mammoplasty and full ANC) in Jan 2017. Path results - G3 S3 with 13/15 nodes still positive and a scattered tumour over 51mm. Full body CT and Bone scan clear. 20 rounds of radio and now Zoladex and Tamoxifen! .....phew...)
Posts.Title: Stage III Cancer Survivors .... 10+ Years and Out AlwaysHope karen1956
